trans-unit.source: Provides an HTTP handler for processing requests for script files that are embedded as resources in an assembly.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> class processes all requests for embedded script files that are referenced through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> clase procesa todas las solicitudes de archivos de script incrustados que se hace referencia a través de la <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> object retrieves the embedded script library and any localized resources for the script library.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> objeto recupera la biblioteca de scripts incrustados y los recursos localizados de la biblioteca de scripts.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.NotifyScriptLoaded%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> object adds a call at the end of the script file to the method of the object.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.NotifyScriptLoaded%2A> propiedad está establecida en `true`, la <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> objeto agrega una llamada al final del archivo de script en el método del objeto.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> class compresses and caches embedded script files for Internet Explorer 7.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, la <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> clase comprime y almacena en caché los archivos de script incrustados para Internet Explorer 7.

trans-unit.source: You can turn compression and caching off through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection> class.
trans-unit.target: Puede activar la compresión y el almacenamiento en caché a través de la <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> y <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection> clase.

trans-unit.source: You set these properties in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Establecer estas propiedades en el archivo Web.config.

trans-unit.source: You can turn compression on for earlier versions of Internet Explorer by creating an alias for Internet Explorer 7 in the section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Puede activar la compresión para las versiones anteriores de Internet Explorer mediante la creación de un alias para Internet Explorer 7 en la sección del archivo Web.config.

trans-unit.source: You then programmatically set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A> property to that alias.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, establezca el valor de mediante programación el <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A> propiedad en ese alias.

trans-unit.source: However, we do not recommend this approach because it will cause a decrease in performance and it introduces a high risk of errors.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, no se recomienda este enfoque porque provocará una disminución del rendimiento y presenta un alto riesgo de errores.

trans-unit.source: The default Web.config file for AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web applications adds the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> as a handler.
trans-unit.target: Agrega el archivo Web.config de manera predeterminada para las aplicaciones Web de ASP.NET con AJAX habilitado el <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> como un controlador.

trans-unit.source: You can manually add the handler to your application by including the following element in the Web.config file:
trans-unit.target: Puede agregar manualmente el controlador a la aplicación incluyendo el elemento siguiente en el archivo Web.config:

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: para trabajar en un entorno hospedado.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valor de la petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />
trans-unit.target: Valor del permiso: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler" /> class.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether another request can use the instance of the class.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <see langword="Request" />, <see langword="Response" />, <see langword="Session" />, and <see langword="Server" />) that are used to service HTTP requests.
When overridden in a derived class, processes HTTP Web requests for a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
Gets a value that indicates whether another request can use the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> instance.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> en todos los casos.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, <see langword="Request" />, <see langword="Response" />, <see langword="Session" />, and <see langword="Server" />) that are used to service HTTP requests.
Processes HTTP Web requests for a script file that is embedded as a resource in an assembly.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>.

trans-unit.source: The type names for the debug and release versions of the embedded script do not match.
